description: Sizzlin' beef, diced tomatoes, dill pickles, gooey cheese and burger sauce, all on top of our fresh, never frozen original dough. Grab it while it's here for the summer.

The possibilities are endless when you get you some Papa Pairings. Pair a Medium 1-topping Pizza with Boneless or Traditional Wings, Papadias, Breadsticks, Cheesesticks, Garlic Knots or Desserts for just $9.99 each.

Sizzlin' beef, dill pickles, diced tomatoes, gooey cheese and burger sauce folded in our fresh, never frozen original dough for a handheld flatbread-style sandwich. Grab it while it's here for the summer.

Sizzlin' beef and bacon, dill pickles, burger sauce, and gooey cheese rolled up in eight pillowy pockets of fresh, never frozen original dough. Served with burger sauce for dipping. Grab 'em while they're here for the summer.
